CustomField.description: Provide Name of Global Apex class which should be invoked at the time of evaluating this Condition. Given Apex class must have implemented "ILightningActionConditionValidator" interface
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide Name of Global Apex class which should be invoked at the time of evaluating this Condition. Given Apex class must have implemented "ILightningActionConditionValidator" interface
CustomField.label: Apex Class Name
